title: Chastain’s salary ‘doesn’t make sense’
text:
Jessica Chastain’s ‘Martian’ salary was way lower than reported Lindsey Kupfer New York Post Jessica Chastain’s ‘Martian’ salary was way lower than reported Lindsey Kupfer New York Post The Martian trailer 3:17 
Left behind by his crew, a stranded astronaut (Matt Damon) must find a way to survive on Mars. June 9th 2015 4 months ago /video/video.news.com.au/Entertainment/ 
JESSICA Chastain reveals her “Martian” salary was much lower than it was originally reported to be. 
“Someone wrote an article once that said I made a certain amount of money for The Martian ,” she said on Huff Post Live . 
“I made less than a quarter of that in reality.” 
Although she didn’t specify which outlet incorrectly wrote about her paycheck, Star Magazine reported in June that Chastain earned $9.6 million AUD for her role as Melissa Lewis in The Martian , while star Matt Damon was reported to have earned $34.4 million for his role. 
Less than a quarter of that figure would mean the actress — who plays a large role in the movie, though not even close to that of Damon — earned roughly $2.4 for her work on the drama. 
“For me, listen, it’s wonderful that people are starting to talk about the wage gap and really that it’s an issue,” she said. Other Stories
